name: Flea Exterminator
description:
A game about a cat who tries to keep its flies but as to pass through cleaning stations.

Made in Volt HyperCasual Jam 2021.

Cristiana Béjinha: 3D Artist- ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/cristianabejinha

Érica Andreina: 2D Artist- Twitter: https://twitter.com/araviaandreina

Rui Humberto: Game Developer - Twitter: https://twitter.com/Rumberto_
